languages.text: {n}Капеллан тяжело вздыхает, глядя на рыдающего ребенка.{/n} "У нее теперь никого нет, получается — мамаша сбежала на край галактики, а папаша... Ну, вы сами все видели". {n}Мужчина морщит лоб, после чего, чертыхнувшись, кивает.{/n} "Я за ней пригляжу, пока она не подрастет. Сами понимаете, маленькая девочка с огромным состоянием — не хватает только мишень на лбу ей намалевать. Если Аделия будет со мной, то никто ее пальцем тронуть не посмеет: благо, грехи моего прошлого даровали мне определенную репутацию. Ну, а если посмеют..." {n}Он многозначительно косится на тело Каса.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Капеллан тяжело вздыхает, глядя на рыдающего ребенка.{/n} "У нее теперь никого нет, получается — мамаша сбежала на край галактики, а папаша... Ну, вы сами все видели". {n}Мужчина морщит лоб, после чего, чертыхнувшись, кивает.{/n} "Я за ней пригляжу, пока она не подрастет. Сами понимаете, маленькая девочка с огромным состоянием — не хватает только мишень на лбу ей намалевать. Если Аделия будет со мной, то никто ее пальцем тронуть не посмеет: благо, грехи моего прошлого даровали мне определенную репутацию. Ну, а если посмеют..." {n}Он многозначительно косится на тело Каса.{/n}
traits.speaker: SideQuestChaplain

languages.text: {n}Chaplain sighs heavily as he looks at the weeping child.{/n} "She's got no one left now. Her mother ran off to the edge of the galaxy, and her father... Well, you saw it yourself." {n}His brow furrows. After a pause, he curses under his breath and nods.{/n} "I'll look after her until she's grown up. I don't think I need to spell it out for you: a little girl with a tremendous fortune... might as well paint a target on her forehead. If I take Adelia in, no one will dare to hurt her, courtesy of the reputation that my turbulent past has earned me. And if they do dare..." {n}He casts a meaningful sidelong glance at Kas's body.{/n}

languages.text: {n}教戒官は重くため息をつき、泣き叫ぶ子供を見る。{/n}「彼女にはもう誰もいません。母親は銀河の果てへと逃げ去り、父親は…今見た通りです」{n}教戒官は眉をひそめる。しばらく間を置いてから、息を殺して罵り、うなずいた。{/n}「この子が大きくなるまでは、私が面倒を見ましょう。あなたにあえて詳しく説明する必要はないと思いますが…莫大な財産を持った少女など、額に狙ってほしいと書いているようなものです。私がアデリアを引き取れば、彼女を敢えて傷つけようとする者はいないでしょう。私の、波乱に満ちた過去で得た評判の賜物ですね。そして、もしそのような者がいれば…」{n}彼は、キャスの遺体を意味ありげに見つめた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Chaplain sighs heavily as he looks at the weeping child.{/n} "She's got no one left now. Her mother ran off to the edge of the galaxy, and her father... Well, you saw it yourself." {n}His brow furrows. After a pause, he curses under his breath and nods.{/n} "I'll look after her until she's grown up. I don't think I need to spell it out for you: a little girl with a tremendous fortune... might as well paint a target on her forehead. If I take Adelia in, no one will dare to hurt her, courtesy of the reputation that my turbulent past has earned me. And if they do dare..." {n}He casts a meaningful sidelong glance at Kas's body.{/n}

traits.speaker: SideQuestChaplain

languages.text: {n}牧师看着哭泣的女孩，沉重地叹了口气。{/n}“她现在已经没有亲人了。她的母亲跑到了银河系的边缘，而她的父亲……你也亲眼看到了。”{n}他皱起眉头，低声咒骂了一句，随后点了点头。{/n}“我会好好照顾她，直到她长大成人。我猜我应该不用和你多解释些什么，这个小女孩拥有富可敌国的财富……这简直就相当于在她脑门上画了个靶子。不过，只要我负责照顾阿德莉雅，就没人敢伤害她了，毕竟我以前的日子都不是白混的。如果有谁敢动这个小姑娘的话……”{n}他意味深长地瞥了卡斯的尸体一眼。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Chaplain sighs heavily as he looks at the weeping child.{/n} "She's got no one left now. Her mother ran off to the edge of the galaxy, and her father... Well, you saw it yourself." {n}His brow furrows. After a pause, he curses under his breath and nods.{/n} "I'll look after her until she's grown up. I don't think I need to spell it out for you: a little girl with a tremendous fortune... might as well paint a target on her forehead. If I take Adelia in, no one will dare to hurt her, courtesy of the reputation that my turbulent past has earned me. And if they do dare..." {n}He casts a meaningful sidelong glance at Kas's body.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}牧师看着哭泣的女孩，沉重地叹了口气。{/n}“她现在已经没有亲人了。她的母亲跑到了银河系的边缘，而她的父亲……你也亲眼看到了。”{n}他皱起眉头，低声咒骂了一句，随后点了点头。{/n}“我会好好照顾她，直到她长大成人。我猜我应该不用和你多解释些什么，这个小女孩拥有富可敌国的财富……这简直就相当于在她脑门上画了个靶子。不过，只要我负责照顾阿德莉雅，就没人敢伤害她了，毕竟我以前的日子都不是白混的。如果有谁敢动这个小姑娘的话……”{n}他意味深长地瞥了卡斯的尸体一眼。{/n}
traits.speaker: SideQuestChaplain

languages.text: {n}Chapelain laisse échapper un profond soupir en regardant l'enfant en pleurs.{/n} « Elle n'a plus personne. Sa mère a fui jusqu'aux confins de la galaxie et son père... Eh bien, vous avez vu. » {n}Il fronce les sourcils. Au bout de quelques instants, il jure à voix basse et hoche la tête.{/n} « Je veillerai sur elle jusqu'à ce qu'elle soit adulte. Je ne pense pas avoir besoin de vous expliquer mes raisons : une petite fille avec une immense fortune... Autant lui dessiner une cible sur le front. Si j'accueille Adélia à mes côtés, personne n'osera lui faire de mal. Voilà ce que m'assure la réputation que me vaut mon tumultueux passé. Et s'ils osent... » {n}Il lance un regard éloquent au corps de Kas.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Chaplain sighs heavily as he looks at the weeping child.{/n} "She's got no one left now. Her mother ran off to the edge of the galaxy, and her father... Well, you saw it yourself." {n}His brow furrows. After a pause, he curses under his breath and nods.{/n} "I'll look after her until she's grown up. I don't think I need to spell it out for you: a little girl with a tremendous fortune... might as well paint a target on her forehead. If I take Adelia in, no one will dare to hurt her, courtesy of the reputation that my turbulent past has earned me. And if they do dare..." {n}He casts a meaningful sidelong glance at Kas's body.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Chapelain laisse échapper un profond soupir en regardant l'enfant en pleurs.{/n} « Elle n'a plus personne. Sa mère a fui jusqu'aux confins de la galaxie et son père... Eh bien, vous avez vu. » {n}Il fronce les sourcils. Au bout de quelques instants, il jure à voix basse et hoche la tête.{/n} « Je veillerai sur elle jusqu'à ce qu'elle soit adulte. Je ne pense pas avoir besoin de vous expliquer mes raisons : une petite fille avec une immense fortune... Autant lui dessiner une cible sur le front. Si j'accueille Adélia à mes côtés, personne n'osera lui faire de mal. Voilà ce que m'assure la réputation que me vaut mon tumultueux passé. Et s'ils osent... » {n}Il lance un regard éloquent au corps de Kas.{/n}
traits.speaker: SideQuestChaplain

languages.text: {n}Capellán suspira profundamente y mira a la chica que llora.{/n} «Ahora no le queda nadie. Su madre escapó a los confines de la galaxia y su padre... bueno, acaba de verlo». {n}Frunce el ceño. Tras una pausa, maldice en voz baja y asiente.{/n} «Cuidaré de ella hasta que haya crecido. No creo que necesite explicárselo: una niña con semejante fortuna... solo falta pintarle la diana en la frente. Pero si acojo a Adelia, nadie se atreverá a hacerle daño gracias a la reputación que me da mi pasado. Y si alguien se atreve...». {n}Lanza una mirada cargada de significado al cadáver de Kas.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Chaplain sighs heavily as he looks at the weeping child.{/n} "She's got no one left now. Her mother ran off to the edge of the galaxy, and her father... Well, you saw it yourself." {n}His brow furrows. After a pause, he curses under his breath and nods.{/n} "I'll look after her until she's grown up. I don't think I need to spell it out for you: a little girl with a tremendous fortune... might as well paint a target on her forehead. If I take Adelia in, no one will dare to hurt her, courtesy of the reputation that my turbulent past has earned me. And if they do dare..." {n}He casts a meaningful sidelong glance at Kas's body.{/n}

Su madre escapó a los confines de la galaxia y su padre... bueno, acaba de verlo». {n}Frunce el ceño. Tras una pausa, maldice en voz baja y asiente.{/n} «Cuidaré de ella hasta que haya crecido. No creo que necesite explicárselo: una niña con semejante fortuna... solo falta pintarle la diana en la frente. Pero si acojo a Adelia, nadie se atreverá a hacerle daño gracias a la reputación que me da mi pasado. Y si alguien se atreve...». {n}Lanza una mirada cargada de significado al cadáver de Kas.{/n}
traits.speaker: SideQuestChaplain

languages.text: {n}Chaplain seufzt schwer, als er von dem weinenden Kind aufblickt.{/n} "Jetzt hat sie niemanden mehr. Ihre Mutter ist an den Rand der Galaxie geflohen und ihre Vater ... Tja, Ihr habt es ja selbst gesehen." {n}Er runzelt die Stirn. Nach einer Pause stößt er einen unterdrückten Fluch aus und nickt.{/n} "Ich werde mich um sie kümmern, bis sie erwachsen ist. Ich denke, ich muss das nicht betonen. Ein kleines Mädchen mit einem beträchtlichen Vermögen ... könnte genauso gut eine Zielscheibe auf der Stirn haben. Wenn ich Adelia aufnehme, wird es dank des Rufs, den ich mir aufgebaut habe, niemand wagen, ihr etwas anzutun. Und falls doch ..." {n}Er wirft einen bedeutungsvollen Blick auf Kas' Leichnam.{/n}

Well, you saw it yourself." {n}His brow furrows. After a pause, he curses under his breath and nods.{/n} "I'll look after her until she's grown up. I don't think I need to spell it out for you: a little girl with a tremendous fortune... might as well paint a target on her forehead. If I take Adelia in, no one will dare to hurt her, courtesy of the reputation that my turbulent past has earned me. And if they do dare..." {n}He casts a meaningful sidelong glance at Kas's body.{/n}

Tja, Ihr habt es ja selbst gesehen." {n}Er runzelt die Stirn. Nach einer Pause stößt er einen unterdrückten Fluch aus und nickt.{/n} "Ich werde mich um sie kümmern, bis sie erwachsen ist. Ich denke, ich muss das nicht betonen. Ein kleines Mädchen mit einem beträchtlichen Vermögen ... könnte genauso gut eine Zielscheibe auf der Stirn haben. Wenn ich Adelia aufnehme, wird es dank des Rufs, den ich mir aufgebaut habe, niemand wagen, ihr etwas anzutun. Und falls doch ..." {n}Er wirft einen bedeutungsvollen Blick auf Kas' Leichnam.{/n}
traits.speaker: SideQuestChaplain

languages.text: {n}Papaz, ağlayan kıza bakarken derinden iç çekiyor.{/n} "Kimsesi kalmadı. Annesi galaksinin diğer ucuna kaçtı gitti, babası da... Gördünüz işte." {n}Kaşlarını çatıyor. Biraz duraksadıktan sonra sessizce küfür edip başını sallıyor.{/n} "Büyüyene kadar ona ben bakacağım. Durumu açıklamama gerek yok herhâlde. İnanılmaz zengin, küçük bir kız... Alnının ortasına hedef tahtası koysak yeridir. Adelia'yı ben alırsam çalkantılı geçmişimin getirdiği ün sağ olsun, kimse ona zarar vermeye cüret edemez. Ederlerse de..." {n}Göz ucuyla Kas'ın bedenine doğru anlamlı bir bakış atıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Chaplain sighs heavily as he looks at the weeping child.{/n} "She's got no one left now. Her mother ran off to the edge of the galaxy, and her father... Well, you saw it yourself." {n}His brow furrows. After a pause, he curses under his breath and nods.{/n} "I'll look after her until she's grown up. I don't think I need to spell it out for you: a little girl with a tremendous fortune... might as well paint a target on her forehead. If I take Adelia in, no one will dare to hurt her, courtesy of the reputation that my turbulent past has earned me. And if they do dare..." {n}He casts a meaningful sidelong glance at Kas's body.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Papaz, ağlayan kıza bakarken derinden iç çekiyor.{/n} "Kimsesi kalmadı. Annesi galaksinin uçurumundan atladı, babası da... Gördünüz işte." {n}Kaşlarını çatıyor. Biraz duraksadıktan sonra sessizce küfür edip başını sallıyor.{/n} "Büyüyene kadar ona ben bakacağım.Tüm detayları açıklamama gerek yok herhâlde. İnanılmaz zengin, küçük bir kız... Alnının ortasına hedef tahtası koysak yeridir. Adelia'yı ben alırsam tehlikeli geçmişim dolayısıyla kazandığım ün hatırına kimse ona zarar vermeye cüret edemez. Ederlerse..." {n}Göz ucuyla Kas'ın bedenine doğru anlamlı bir bakış atıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: SideQuestChaplain
